channel.title: NEO-SCAPE [PI] | Flower Game | Minigames | Customs | much more
channel.description:
[center]CREDITS TO Brian's Inc™
Name of server: Neo-scape links removed
Server Pictures
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vrsrp2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/e7e32f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/f2iqol.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/16jg7br.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/suv85t.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ouvz1u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/qps1hk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2hzhjr7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zxtlw2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/21m67ut.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/20u2xrl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2uhmjqf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/10ygxo6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ensuaa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/zyakvc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/dyw1nc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2h6al39.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2v36fz6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hojm8k.png[/img]
Features[/B] Deadlock fixed Better Slayer System Boxing Arena Flower Game Funpk Custom Crowns Started Dungeoneering Added better combat Fixed A Dupe Better Skilling Added Many Commands Added custom items 100% Gree Grees 100% sled 100% ring of stone 100% easter egg ring Updated shops AND added new home Donator Shop so much more...
Features Already in Server (Credits to recz0rd)
- Has beast combat! - 317 server with 633 charactermodels and 602 cache. - Server is based to Pking and skilling. - Specials work 100% - Dragon claws works 100% - Dragonfireshield works 100% With charging! - 100% Working pvp armours and items ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! - Corporal beast lair - Edge is home - Working spell timers / spells! - Tormented demon! - Thieving from stall for money if needed - Working special / health bar - Banking works. - Skillcape emotes. - ::Pure on begin! - Nice Dfs handler
[/center]
